text: March 14, 2018 / 8:39 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-City Of London Investment Management Company Ltd Issues Public Letter To China Fund Inc Stockholders Reuters Staff   China Fund Inc: * CITY OF LONDON INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT COMPANY LTD ISSUES PUBLIC LETTER TO CHINA FUND INC STOCKHOLDERS * CITY OF LONDON INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT COMPANY LTD TO CHINA FUND INC SHAREHOLDERS - SEEKING SUPPORT TO ELECT 2 INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR NOMINEES Source text for Eikon:
